section.title: The Infamous Willy Wonka and His Chocolate Factory

body.p: The next day is the day everyone is invited to tour Wonka’s chocolate factory.
Charlie arrives with his Grandpa Joe, who springs out of bed for the first time in decades.
They arrive at the factory gates and are greeted by Mr. Willy Wonka himself.
Grandpa Joe and Charlie begin to meet the other children and parents but don’t seem to have much in common with them.
They enter the factory and marvel at the unbelievable sights, sounds, and smells of the unexplainable candies that await them.
